item.name: Soul Growers
item.winemaker: James Lindner, Paul Lindner, David Cruickshank, Paul Heinicke
item.description: Soul Growers is owned by its four winemaker partners, headed by James Lindner. Its estate vineyards are mainly on hillside country in the Seppeltsfield region, with shiraz, cabernet sauvignon, grenache and chardonnay the most important, and lesser plantings of mataro and black muscat; there are then pocket-handkerchief blocks of shiraz at Tanunda, mataro at Nuriootpa and a 1.2ha planting of grenache at Krondorf. Exports to the US, Canada, Singapore, Hong Kong and China.
